Mind flayers, also known as illithids (meaning "mind flayers" or "mind rulers" in Undercommon), and sometimes referred to as ghaik by the githyanki, were evil and sadistic aberrations, feared by sentient creatures on many worlds across the multiverse due to their powerful innate psionic abilities.
